feed.title: Track Awesome Swift Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A collaborative list of awesome Swift libraries and resources. Feel free to contribute!

entry.content:
JSON

  • ReerCodable (‚≠ê347) - Codable extensions using Swift macro.

Utility / Barcode

  • ReerKit (‚≠ê110) - Powerful Swift foundation library of extensions and providing utility functions to supercharge your iOS/macOS/Linux development workflow.

entry.title: Awesome Swift Updates on Feb 10 - Feb 16, 2025
entry.content:
Dependency Managers

  • Swiftly (‚≠ê749) - Swift CLI toolchain installer to install different versions of Swift.

Misc

  • Forked (‚≠ê472) - Generalized approach to managing shared data in Swift applications to support Local-first apps.

Audio

  • Soundable (‚≠ê95) - Soundable allows you to play sounds, single and in sequence, in a very easy way.

Realm

  • Unrealm (‚≠ê537) - Unrealm enables you to easily store Swift native Classes, Structs and Enums into Realm.

XML

  • XMLCoder (‚≠ê833) - XMLEncoder & XMLDecoder based on Codable protocols from the standard library.

Camera

  • MijickCamera (‚≠ê483) - Camera made simple. Fully customizable camera library that significantly reduces implementation time and effort.

Images / Barcode

  • Brightroom (‚≠ê3.5k) - An image editor and engine using CoreImage.
  • MCScratchImageView (‚≠ê358) - A custom ImageView that is used to cover the surface of other view like a scratch card, user can swipe the mulch to see the view below.

Quality / Barcode

  • AnyLint (‚≠ê117) üêß - Lint anything by combining the power of Swift & regular expressions.

System / Barcode

  • LaunchAtLogin (‚≠ê1.6k) - Easily add 'Launch at Login' functionality to your sandboxed macOS app.

Testing / Barcode

  • XCTest (‚≠ê1.2k) - The XCTest Project, A Swift core library for providing unit test support.

UI / Barcode

  • BulletinBoard (‚≠ê5.4k) - Generates and manages contextual cards displayed at the bottom of the screen.
  • Preferences (‚≠ê1.5k) - Add a preferences window to your macOS app in minutes.
  • SweetCurtain (‚≠ê115) - Really sweet and easy bottom pullable sheet implementation. You can find a similar implementation in applications like Apple Maps, Find My, Stocks, etc.

Alert / Barcode

  • MijickPopups (‚≠ê1.6k) - Popups, popovers, sheets, alerts, toasts, banners, (...) presentation made simple.
  • SPAlert (‚≠ê2.6k) - Native popup from Apple Music & Feedback in AppStore. Contains Done & Heart presets.

Permissions / Barcode

  • SPPermission (‚≠ê5.8k) - Simple request permission with native UI and interactive animation.

Transition / Barcode

  • MijickNavigattie (‚≠ê307) - Easy navigation with SwiftUI.

UITableView / Barcode

  • WLEmptyState (‚≠ê319) - A component that lets you customize the view when the dataset of UITableView is empty.

Walkthrough / Barcode

  • SuggestionsKit (‚≠ê71) - Library for educating users about features in app.

Utility / Barcode

  • ZamzamKit (‚≠ê271) - A collection of micro utilities and extensions for Standard Library, Foundation and UIKit.
entry.summary: 21 awesome projects updated on Feb 10 - Feb 16, 2025

Fonts

Transition / Barcode

UICollectionView / Barcode

  • Drag and Drop UICollectionView (‚≠ê529) - Dragging and Dropping data across multiple UICollectionViews.
  • SwiftSpreadsheet (‚≠ê641) - Fully customizable spreadsheet CollectionViewLayout.
  • TagCellLayout (‚≠ê359) - UICollectionView layout for Tags with Left, Center & Right alignments.

UITableView / Barcode

  • Persei (‚≠ê3.5k) - Animated top menu for UITableView / UICollectionView / UIScrollView.

  • YNExpandableCell (‚≠ê455) - Awesome expandable, collapsible tableview cell for iOS.

Walkthrough / Barcode

  • Instructions (‚≠ê5.2k) - A library to create app walkthroughs and guided tours.

  • SwiftyWalkthrough (‚≠ê375) - The easiest way to create a great walkthrough experience in your apps.

Utility / Barcode

  • AlexaSkillsKit (‚≠ê185) - Develop custom Alexa Skills.

  • Dollar (‚≠ê4.3k) - Similar to Lo-Dash or Underscore in Javascript.
  • ObjectiveKit (‚≠ê845) - API for Objective C runtime functions.
  • protobuf-swift (‚≠ê941) - ProtocolBuffers.
  • Prototope - Library of lightweight interfaces for prototyping, bridged to JS.
  • RandomKit (‚≠ê1.5k) üêß - Random data generation.
  • ReadabilityKit (‚≠ê839) - Preview extractor for news, articles and full-texts.
  • ResourceKit (‚≠ê88) - Enable autocomplete use resources.
  • Result (‚≠ê2.5k) - Type modelling the success/failure of arbitrary operations.
  • Runes (‚≠ê825) - Functional operators: flatMap, map, apply.
  • SwiftGen-Storyboard (‚≠ê9.5k) - A tool to auto-generate enums for all your Storyboards, Scenes and Segues constants + appropriate convenience accessors.
  • SwiftRandom (‚≠ê561) - A tiny generator of random data.
  • SwiftRater (‚≠ê372) - A utility that reminds your iPhone app's users to review the app.
  • Swiftz (‚≠ê3.3k) - Functional programming.
  • Then (‚≠ê4.3k) - Super sweet syntactic sugar for initializers.
  • UTIKit (‚≠ê253) - an UTI (Uniform Type Identifier) wrapper.
  • XestiMonitors (‚≠ê271) - An extensible monitoring framework.

Validation / Barcode

  • FormValidatorSwift (‚≠ê494) - Allows you to validate inputs of text fields and text views in a convenient way.
  • Input Mask (‚≠ê585) - Pattern-based user input formatter, parser and validator for iOS.
  • SwiftValidators (‚≠ê240) - String validation for iOS (inspired by validator.js).

Phone Numbers / Barcode

  • PhoneNumberKit (‚≠ê5.3k) - Framework for parsing, formatting and validating international phone numbers. Inspired by Google's libphonenumber.

Version Manager / Barcode

  • Version (‚≠ê185) - Version represents and compares semantic versions.

Video / Barcode

  • BMPlayer (‚≠ê2k) - A video player for iOS, based on AVPlayer, support the horizontal, vertical screen. support adjust volume, brigtness and seek by slide.
  • Player (‚≠ê2.1k) - iOS video player, simple drop in component for playing and streaming media.
  • SwiftVideoBackground (‚≠ê352) - Easy to Use UIView subclass for implementating a video background.
entry.summary: 286 awesome projects updated on May 29 - Jun 04, 2017

entry.title: Awesome Swift Updates on Nov 21 - Nov 27, 2016
